text1: The _____ kitten hid under the bed during the storm.
know_more: Context clues: hiding during storm suggests fear

text1: The teacher asked us to _____ the passage carefully before answering.

know_more: Running 26 miles makes you very tired

know_more: Explorers who discover things are brave
